data.description: Whether the Support X/Y Distance overrides the Support Z Distance or vice versa. When X/Y overrides Z the X/Y distance can push away the support from the model, influencing the actual Z distance to the overhang.
data.img_description: The image shows the priority when X/Y overrides Z, and when Z override X/Y.
data.hints: - After the launch of Ultimaker PVA, the support Z-distance was set to 0. This introduced a scenario where the X/Y-distance would offset the PVA from the model, decreasing the support quality. The support distance priority ensures that the PVA aligns with the model perfectly.
